title: How to Make Gingko Tea

steps.headline: Place the leaves into a bowl.
Pour the hot water over the leaves.
Strain and pour into the teacup.
steps.description:
Drink & enjoy
To sweeten, add honey or lemon juice.

tyn: Ceramic or glass bowl for steeping
Tea kettle or electric jug for boiling water
Strainer (use a tea strainer the size of the cup for easiest straining)
text:
Place the leaves into a bowl.  Pour the hot water over the leaves.  Steep for 5 to 7 minutes.  Strain and pour into the teacup. Drink & enjoy
To sweeten, add honey or lemon juice. Finished.
sentences: Place the leaves into a bowl.
Pour the hot water over the leaves.
Strain and pour into the teacup.

Drink & enjoy
To sweeten, add honey or lemon juice.
